issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Simplify expression tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10161](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10161). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is some code duplication in the tests of datafusion expressions.rs.

Lets try to DRY them.
